fields.name: Cozy Cottage
fields.description: A cozy 2 bedroom cottage in the heart of London.
fields.full_description: This cozy 2 bedroom cottage is located in the heart of London. It's the perfect place to relax after a day of exploring the city.

fields.name: Country Manor
fields.description: A spacious manor in the beautiful Yorkshire countryside.
fields.full_description: This spacious manor is located in the beautiful Yorkshire countryside. With plenty of room and stunning views, it's the perfect getaway.

fields.name: Lakeside Retreat
fields.description: A tranquil retreat with stunning views of the lake.
fields.full_description: This tranquil retreat offers stunning views of the lake. Located in the Lake District, it's the perfect place for a peaceful getaway.

fields.name: City Apartment
fields.description: Modern apartment in the city center with a castle view.
fields.full_description: This modern apartment is located in the city center of Edinburgh. With a view of the castle, it's the perfect place for a city break.

fields.name: Rustic Barn
fields.description: A rustic barn conversion in the Cornish countryside.
fields.full_description: This rustic barn conversion offers a unique stay in the beautiful Cornish countryside. With its original features and modern amenities, it's the perfect blend of old and new.

fields.name: Modern Loft
fields.description: A modern loft apartment in the heart of Manchester.
fields.full_description: This modern loft apartment offers a chic and stylish stay in the heart of Manchester. With its open-plan design and contemporary furnishings, it's the perfect city retreat.

fields.name: Beach House
fields.description: A charming beach house with sea views in Brighton.
fields.full_description: This charming beach house offers stunning sea views and easy access to the beach. With its cozy interiors and seaside location, it's the perfect place for a relaxing beach holiday.

fields.name: Country Cottage
fields.description: A quaint country cottage in the peaceful Cotswolds.
fields.full_description: This quaint country cottage offers a peaceful stay in the heart of the Cotswolds. With its charming interiors and beautiful surroundings, it's the perfect place for a tranquil retreat.

fields.name: City Penthouse
fields.description: A luxury city penthouse with panoramic views in Birmingham.
fields.full_description: This luxury city penthouse offers panoramic views of Birmingham. With its modern amenities and central location, it's the perfect place for a city break.

fields.name: Lakeside Cabin
fields.description: A cozy lakeside cabin in the beautiful Lake District.
fields.full_description: This cozy lakeside cabin offers a tranquil stay in the beautiful Lake District. With its stunning lake views and cozy interiors, it's the perfect place for a peaceful retreat.

fields.name: Historic Manor
fields.description: A historic manor house with beautiful gardens in York.
fields.full_description: This historic manor house offers a unique stay in the historic city of York. With its beautiful gardens and original features, it's the perfect place for a luxury getaway.

fields.name: Terraced House
fields.description: A convenient home in the heart of Norfolk City.
